title: The Wildest, Most Expensive Road Shoe at Eurobike Gives Balenciaga a Run for Their Money
content:
The LoreTwo corrects some of the mistakes of the first generation while still offering a reported performance advantage. Would you wear these?

Read the full article at The Wildest, Most Expensive Road Shoe at Eurobike Gives Balenciaga a Run for Their Money on Velo.
author: Josh Ross
